game.name: Mermaid Resurrection Emergency
game.description:
Oh no! Your favorite princess got attacked by a group of some deadly sharks when she went deep into the sea. It looks she had some major injury so it is necessary to give her now immediate medical attention. Take her straight into the emergency room and start providing her with the best treatment in this brand new girls game! You are the only one to rescue her from the biggest trouble of her life. Grab all your medical tools and get ready to go through her the needful medical test to save her life in Mermaid Resurrection Emergency!

Do not waste your time since poor Ariel needs your help urgently. Try to be her doctor and guide the lady to recover by applying the emergency resurrection techniques like CTR on her body in this html5 doctor game! Use the oxygen mask to see if the oxygen reaches into her lungs properly! Once it is done, make sure to use the needful pressure on her chest. Try to make her heartbeat jump again with the help of an electric shock which you can create using a defibrillator and a special gel!

Great job! Your job does not end when she wakes up finally. Put an IV to check if he is getting food filled up with the needful nutrients in this hospital simulator! Check if she gets her pill on time and hydrates her body with some water! Then you will see her coming to her senses again. Hope all your efforts have worked in the right direction and helped the lady to get back to her life again! Good luck to try out more popular titles from the category of free girls games that you can enjoy online free here on atmegame.com, no download required!
